item.title: European Energy Data Analysis

item.title: NFL Data Analysis
item.description: NFL Attendance For this project, I will be examining the NFL attendance data from the attendance.csv file on the Tidy Tuesday Website. The data consists of 10,846 observations and 8 variables. The dataset shows the the total attendance and weekly attendance for every NFL team dating back to the 2000 NFL season. Another dataset that I will be using to explore NFL attendence is the standings.csv file from the Tidy Tuesday website.
